Interface IAeCopyOperationContext

All Superinterfaces:
IAeNamespaceContext
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeCopyOperationContext
public interface IAeCopyOperationContext
extends IAeNamespaceContext

The context for the copy operation.

createFunctionExecutionContext

public IAeFunctionExecutionContext createFunctionExecutionContext(java.lang.Object aContext,
                                                                  AeXPathHelper aXPathHelper)
Creates a function context for use in executing functions within a XPath query. Note that this method is not used (and not to be used) when executing a BPEL expression, as it assumes XPath.
